/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The road, a vein of the city, is teeming with life as cars and taxis navigate their way. The buildings that line the street stand tall, their facades a mix of modern and traditional architecture, reflecting the city's evolution over time. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking down the street, giving a sense of being right there amidst the hustle and bustle.
